participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: friendly and empathetic, enjoys connecting with others.
participant_1.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: aspiring and hardworking, dreams of making a better life.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm.

content.text: Yes, my family has horses. I was raised on a horse farm. And what about you?
i farm horses . i own a farm .
Really? You have a farm, wonderful! Do you like to raise horses?
i do , but i do not have a lot of money .
I ams from a small town and I know what does it mean. What is your goal?
i am a small town wife , but i am not very good at it .
Do you want to get to any big city?
i do , but i do not have much time to travel .
I will have a lot of free time to travel when I am a lawer
you are a very good person .
thank you . i do not have a lot of money .
